alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A line of strong showers and isolated thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Los Angeles County through 730 PM PDT... At 657 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong showers and isolated thunderstorm stretching from neatr Mt. Wilson through Monrovia to El Monte, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down trees, tree limbs, and power lines, and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Dimas...Glendora...Pomona...West Covina...Azusa...Arcadia... Sierra Madre...Monrovia...El Monte...Covina...Claremont... Irwindale...Duarte...and Temple City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
